          <title>
            <string language="en">Things that need electricity to work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sachen, die Elektrizität benötigen zu arbeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses qui ont besoin d'électricité pour

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas que necessitam a eletricidade trabalhar</string>

λειτουργήσουν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosas que necesitan electricidad trabajar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows different things that need electrical energy to do work.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt unterschiedliche Sachen, die 
elektrische Energie benötigen, Arbeit zu erledigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les différentes choses 
qui ont besoin d'énergie électrique pour effectuer le travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as coisas diferentes que 
necessitam a energia elétrica fazer o trabalho.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le cose differenti che

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra diversas cosas que
